name: .RADMAN File Extension
summary: Learn about .RADMAN files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Because RADMAN files have been encrypted by ransomware, you cannot open them as you would normally. However, you can attempt to decrypt your RADMAN files using Emsisoft Decryptor for STOP Djvu. Read the instructions at the program's website carefully before attempting to decrypt your RADMAN files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
